channel.title: WAIT Conference 2015 - a Monkeh Works Ltd production: categories: general
channel.description: The 1st annual WAIT Conference presents two days of education, inspiration and collaboration in the heart of Manchester. Join us on 4-5th June 2015.

item.title: Closing Down
item.description: It is with great sadness that we officially announce the end of WAIT 2015 before it has even begun.

item.title: Flat Ticket Rate For All
item.description: WAIT 2015 launched with two ticket levels; the Early Bird and the Flat Rate. We've just made that a lot simpler.

item.title: Session Voting Open
item.description:
We opened our call for speakers in December 2015 and received an overwhelming number of submissions considering this is our first year.

The call is now closed and we have opened the sessions for public voting, giving the attendees the ability to help shape their conference.

item.title: Call for Speakers
item.description: WAIT 2015 is built for the community and we want the community to be a part of the event.

item.title: Welcome to WAIT
item.description: On the list of 'pros' for those of us who create and mould the web is the great community that exists around our work. This community is a prime source of knowledge and support - for those who have been designing or developing for a while, or the newbies coming up the ranks.
